creditline: Gift of funds from the Docents and other friends in memory of Janey Leck
description: roots, thick stem and leaves at bottom; separate stem with dark pink graduated flowers above stem and leaves; cross-section of blossom, ULC; seed pods in LRQ
inscription:
Inscription

at bottom center, in the plate, in brown: [La Digitale ou Gants de Notre-Dame./ Digitalis Purpurea Linn./ Ital. Gantelli. Angl. Foxglove./ Allem. Fingerhut-blumen.]; LLC, in the plate, in brown: [Genevieve de Nangis Regnault f.]; URC, in brown ink: [87.]
title: La Digitale (Foxglove), from " La Boutique mise a la portee de tout le monde"
